attributes.action: do something about oil fuel heating poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: help people in rural areas who rely soley on oil for their heating. If you cant pay up front for your oil - £500.00 per delivery for 3 mths - then you get no oil, which means sitting in sub zero tempretures with no heating or hot water. We have no energy watchdog acting on our behalf. i petition for Low income families with children to get a fuel allowance OR make oil companies work the same as gas/electric companies setting up a scheme to help low income families, where they cannot refuse you oil if you cannot afford £500 up front.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
